title: Solo From South Carolina
description:
Kirk Minihane is in South Carolina for the secret project and that means the show is being produced by none other than Intern Justin. Kirk picks Justinâ€™s brain on the JFK assassination (4:30). Dan LeBatard takes shots at Kirk because a Redsox fan did not recognize Manny Ramirez(13:35). Whoopi Goldberg wants Jill Biden to be the next Surgeon General of the United States (33:30). A woman accuses Governer Cuomo of sexual harassment (36:30), and Dave Portnoy contributes to a million dollar fund to help save restaurants in New York City (54:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
